steps.name: Given I delete files from AWS S3 bucket
Given I upload the Converter files from Input_Golden_file_Path into yw-rawfile-1 AWS S3 bucket
Then I connect to test database
Then I delete the data from source_file_location collection
Then I write the data into source_file_location collection
Given I upload the Expected_Golden_file files from Expected_Golden_file_Path into yw-golden-1 AWS S3 bucket
Then I delete the data from target_file_location collection
Then I write the data into target_file_location collection
Given I am on login screen
When I enter the valid Login credential
And I hit login button
And I verify dashboard is displayed
Then I click on "Loader Policies" from menu
And I verify the create policy button is displayed
And I click on the create policy button
And I enter policy name ConverterPolicy
And I enter policy version ConverterPolicy
And I enter policy description ConverterPolicy
And I enter policy owner email automation@yieldwerx.com
And I click on Add stage button
And I select "Converter" stage
# And I click on View button
Then I select source format as IMS
And I select source as "ftp"
And I enter source ftp address ConverterPolicy
And I enter source ftp username ConverterPolicy
And I enter source ftp password ConverterPolicy
And I enter source Folder to transfer files from ConverterPolicy
And I select schedule mode as "Poller"
And I select the starting time
And I enter policy polling time ConverterPolicy
And I click on Save button
